name: The Last Stand (Fusionnist)
description:
THE LAST STAND

Overview:

- Play as the wanderer, in his attempt to protect "the Kid" from a hostile environment.
- Your objective is to restore the Kid to full energy.

Mechanics:

- Hunt down energy-filled rocks, crystals and canisters in order to replenish yours and the Kid's energy.
- Four available abilities: a short-range punch, a long-range shot, cube building and heal, each dependent on mouse aiming.
- Fend off wave after wave of creatures. Keep them away from the Kid: they will start stealing its energy when nearby.

Controls:

- WASD: player movement
- Mouse: aim
- Left click: shoot
- Right click: pick up/put down the Kid (when next to it)
- Mouse wheel: toggle abilities
